# NSR Project Structure Template

**Purpose**: Template for generating BitNexus-like project structures using NSR framework

**Version**: 1.0.0  
**Last Updated**: January 2026  
**Owner**: NorthStar Team

---

## Project Structure Generated by NSR

```
[PROJECT_NAME]/
├── frontend/                          # Frontend application
│   ├── src/                           # React source code
│   │   ├── pages/                     # Page components
│   │   ├── components/                # Reusable components
│   │   ├── services/                  # API services
│   │   ├── utils/                     # Utility functions
│   │   ├── contexts/                  # React contexts
│   │   ├── data/                      # Data files
│   │   ├── README.md                  # Frontend src overview
│   │   └── CHANGELOG.md               # Frontend src changelog
│   ├── public/                         # Static assets
│   ├── README.md                      # Frontend overview
│   └── CHANGELOG.md                   # Frontend changelog
│
├── backend/                           # Backend services (one folder per service)
│   ├── README.md                      # Backend folder overview
│   └── CHANGELOG.md                   # Backend changelog
│
├── developers/                        # Developer profiles (source of truth)
│   ├── README.md                      # Developer profiles overview
│   └── CHANGELOG.md                   # Developer profiles changelog
│
├── instructions/                      # External frameworks and instruction sets
│   ├── README.md                      # Instructions folder overview
│   ├── BMAD-METHOD/                   # BMAD Method framework
│   ├── .agent-os/                     # Agent OS configuration
│   └── NSR/                           # NorthStar Rules
│
├── rules/                             # Extracted rules from instruction frameworks
│   ├── README.md                      # Rules directory overview
│   ├── TODO.md                        # Rules TODO
│   └── CHANGELOG.md                   # Rules changelog
│
├── docs/                              # Documentation folder
│   ├── Core Documentation/            # Core project documentation
│   ├── Development/                   # Development documentation
│   ├── Project Management/            # Project management docs
│   ├── Services/                      # Service-specific documentation
│   ├── Setup & Configuration/         # Setup and configuration docs
│   ├── UI & Features/                 # UI and feature documentation
│   ├── Product docs/                  # Product documentation
│   ├── README.md                      # Documentation folder overview
│   └── CHANGELOG.md                   # Documentation changelog
│
├── .cursorrules                       # Cursor IDE rules (generated from NSR)
├── README.md                          # Project overview
├── LICENSE                            # Project license
└── CHANGELOG.md                       # Project changelog
```

## Mandatory Files in Every Folder

**CRITICAL RULE**: Every folder MUST have:
- `README.md` - Folder overview and purpose
- `CHANGELOG.md` - Change tracking (MANDATORY - NO EXCEPTIONS)

## File Structure Rules

1. **No random files in root** - All files must be organized according to structure
2. **Documentation in docs/** - ALL documentation files MUST be in `docs/` folder
3. **One service per folder** - Backend services must have separate folders
4. **Portable developer profiles** - Developer profiles in `developers/` can be moved between projects
5. **Rules extraction** - Rules extracted from frameworks go in `rules/` folder

## Generation Instructions

When using NSR to generate a project:
1. Use this template as the base structure
2. Customize folder names based on project needs
3. Generate all mandatory README.md and CHANGELOG.md files
4. Apply NSR rules from `src/rules/` to generate `.cursorrules`
5. Set up developer profiles in `developers/` folder
6. Initialize documentation structure in `docs/` folder

---
